channel.title: How do you create a character on rsca
channel.description: I tried to create a character on rsca but their password hash is different from rscd so when I set a password on phpmyadmin using rscd's hash it's not the same... Anyone able to set a password on their rsca source as like "password" and send me the hash for it so I can copy paste it into my phpmyadmin to be able to login?

item.title: How do you create a character on rsca
item.dc:creator: @RSCDevil RSCDevil
item.description:
@RSCDevil wrote:

I tried to create a character on rsca but their password hash is different from rscd so when I set a password on phpmyadmin using rscd’s hash it’s not the same… Anyone able to set a password on their rsca source as like “password” and send me the hash for it so I can copy paste it into my phpmyadmin to be able to login?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you create a character on rsca
